title: Google Play Store is a Walled Garden - Here's How to Escape!
description:
Google Play Store locks users into its controlled ecosystem. Here are the several options available to avoid the Play Store, and why you may want to consider them (yes, before your favorite app is mistakenly removed as well) This video is targeted towards individuals looking to deGoogle. 

🔐 Our Website: https://techlore.tech
🕵 Go Incognito Course - to learn about privacy: https://techlore.tech/goincognito
🏫 Techlore Coaching - to get direct support: https://techlore.tech/coaching
💻 Techlore Forum - to connect with other advocates: https://discuss.techlore.tech
🦣 Mastodon - to stay updated: https://social.lol/@techlore

0:00 The Google Play Store Walled Garden
1:42 Alternative 1 - Aurora Store
3:00 Alternative 2 - F-Droid Store
4:22 Alternative 3 - Manual App Installations
4:50 Alternative 3.5 - Obtainium
5:20 Alternative 4 - PWAs, Web Apps, and Mobile Sites
7:08 Combining All the Strategies!
